UPDATE CIRCLE SET READ_COUNT = READ_COUNT +1 WHERE POST_NO = ? AND STATUS ='N'
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET ORIGIN_NAME = ?, NEW_NAME = ?, PATH = ?, UPLOAD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE PHOTO_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT POST_NO,
POST_TITLE, MEMBER_NIC, READ_COUNT, CREATE_DATE
FROM CIRCLE C
JOIN MEMBER M USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE $ LIKE ? AND C.STATUS='N' AND M.STATUS='N' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE ASC )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE CIRCLE SET POST_TITLE = ?, POST_CONTENT = ? WHERE POST_NO = ?
UPDATE CIRCLE SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE POST_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) READ_COUNT FROM CIRCLE WHERE $ Like ? AND STATUS = 'N'

SELECT POST_NO,
POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MEMBER_NIC FROM CIRCLE C
JOIN MEMBER M USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE POST_NO =? AND C.STATUS='N'AND M.STATUS='N'
SELECT PHOTO_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, NEW_NAME, PATH, FILE_LEVEL FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE POST_NO = ? AND BOARD_NO=10 ORDER BY FILE_LEVEL
INSERT INTO REPLY(REPLY_NO,BOARD_NO ,REPLY_CONTENT, POST_NO, WRITER) VALUES(SEQ_PLYNO.NEXTVAL,10,?,?,?)
SELECT REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, MEMBER_NIC, CREATE_DATE FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER ON (WRITER= MEMBER_NO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'N' AND POST_NO = ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC , REPLY_NO DESC
